about-company-block.title: A reliable supplier of highly refined base oils
about-company-block.description: Devoil is a company specializing in the supply of high—quality base oils used in industry, energy, cosmetics and pharmaceuticals. We provide enterprises throughout Russia and the near abroad with stable supplies of oils that meet international quality standards. Our goal is to be a reliable partner for manufacturers, offering flexible terms of cooperation, a wide range and guaranteed product quality.
